title: Formation of a hybrid coordination-molecular complex.
abstract:
noThe synthesis and crystal structure of the lithium hydrate salt of the\ud
charge transfer complex between 3,5-dinitrobenzoic acid and\ud
4-(dimethylamino) benzoic acid is reported. It is the first crystal\ud
structure reported for such a class of hybrid inorganic/organic\ud
material. The design principles may have utility in the future creation\ud
of new ternary and higher complexes
